summary: This document is a forwarded email containing SDNY press clippings from February 2, 2021. The primary subject is a Daily Mail article reporting that Ghislaine Maxwell is complaining about prison conditions and demanding access to her laptop on holidays and weekends.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The British socialite is the subject of a Daily Mail article in the press clippings, where she is reported to be complaining about prison conditions and demanding access to her laptop.

events.title: Maxwell's Prison Complaint Reported
events.description: A Daily Mail article reports that Ghislaine Maxwell is complaining about prison conditions and demanding access to her laptop on holidays and weekends.

keyFacts: The document is a set of SDNY press clippings dated February 2, 2021.
A Daily Mail article reports that Ghislaine Maxwell, age 59, is complaining about prison conditions.
Maxwell is demanding access to her laptop on holidays and weekends.
